https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iaEaoJPd6GCirxu9HiLHy2NwtvZ.jpg Shortly before the end of the Second World War, Anna and her eleven-year-old son Felix seek refuge in the countryside, where a strict Nazi regiment also prevails. In contrast to his mother, Felix slowly succumbs to right-wing propaganda. Das Glaszimmer
